title: Enhancing System Design Practical Competencies: Optimizing Language Education Through Large-Scale Learning Design Analysis

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and comprehension of job-related technical terminology
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for IT/Software Development Professionals

learning_goals: Identify at least three learner behavior patterns through learning design analysis and establish improvement strategies.
Design activities to improve language learning satisfaction by over 20% in blended learning environments.

Learners can monitor language proficiency assessment results (vocabulary, grammar, fluency) biweekly using learning analytics tools (e.g., Google Analytics, LMS reports) and provide at least three types of customized feedback per learner.
Enhance practical application skills by over 15% through job-integrated language tasks.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
